title: Amazon Essentials Men's Long-Sleeve Quarter-Zip Fleece Sweatshirt
description: REGULAR FIT: Comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist
BRUSHED FLEECE: Cut from soft, brushed-back, cotton-polyester blend fleece in a midweight for staying cozy and keeping warm.

EVERYDAY CASUAL STYLING: This pullover quarter-zip sweatshirt is a go-to for an easy, casual look. Match back with Amazon Essentials Men's fleece joggers for a head-to-toe cozy look or style with jeans for everyday on-the-go.
DETAILS: Features a quarter-zip at front, mock neck collar, and rib trim at cuffs and hem.
We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure our clothes are more comfortable, higher quality, and longer lasting—at affordable prices for the whole family.
